revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FAxeCheckAtk}} '''A_FAxeCheckAtk'''
(no parameters) Checks if the current weapon has enough ammo, and if so, jumps to its FireGlow state. It's an equivalent of doing the following, in {{Class|FWeapAxe|Timon's Axe}} Fire state: FAXE B 4 Offset (15, 32) [[A_JumpIfInventory]] ("{{Class|Mana1}}", 1, "FireGlow") This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FWeapAxe}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]][[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]][[Category:Decorate Weapon functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:FAxeCheckAtk}}
